IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. addStableToken(address).custom:error: ChatterPay__ZeroAddress if the token address is zeroChatterPay__AlreadyStableToken if the token is already marked as stable
addStableToken(address).details: Only callable by the contract owner

params.token: The address of the token to mark as stable

execute(address,uint256,bytes).details: Only for use in emergencies or special cases

executeBatchTokenTransfer(address[],addr.details: All arrays must have the same length

params.amounts: Array of token amounts to transfer
params.recipients: Array of addresses that will receive tokens
params.tokens: Array of token addresses to transfer

params.amountOutMin: Minimum amount of output tokens expected

executeTokenTransfer(address,address,uin.details: Only callable by the EntryPoint contract and protected against reentrancy

params.amount: The total amount of tokens to transfer (including fee)
params.recipient: The address that will receive the tokens
params.token: The ERC20 token address to transfer

getTokenFee(address).details: Reverts if the token is not whitelisted

returns._0: The calculated fee in token units

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

removeStableToken(address).custom:error: ChatterPay__ZeroAddress if the token address is zeroChatterPay__NotStableToken if the token is not marked as stable
removeStableToken(address).details: Only callable by the contract owner

params.token: The address of the token to remove from the stable list

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Overrides the standard transferOwnership to manage fee admin privileges

params.newOwner: Address of the new contract owner

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

addStableToken(address).notice: Adds a token to the list of recognized stablecoins

approveToken(address,uint256).notice: Approves a token to be spent by the Uniswap Router

execute(address,uint256,bytes).notice: Allows the owner of the factory to execute arbitrary calls

executeBatchTokenTransfer(address[],addr.notice: Executes multiple token transfers with fee deduction

executeSwap(address,address,uint256,uint.notice: Executes a swap through Uniswap V3

executeTokenTransfer(address,address,uin.notice: Executes a token transfer from this contract to a recipient

getTokenFee(address).notice: Returns the fee amount in token units for a given token,         using the global feeInCents value from contract state.

removeStableToken(address).notice: Removes a token from the list of recognized stablecoins

setCustomPoolFee(address,address,uint24).notice: Sets a custom pool fee for a specific token pair

setCustomSlippage(address,uint256).notice: Sets custom slippage for a token

setTokenWhitelistAndPriceFeed(address,bo.notice: Sets token whitelist and price feed

transferOwnership(address).notice: Transfers ownership of the contract with additional privilege management

documentation.text: @dev Storage layout contract to prevent storage collisions
@notice Version for upgrades
@custom:oz-upgrades-unsafe-allow constructor

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct ISwapRouter.ExactInputSingleParams memory) payable external returns (uint256)

documentation.text:
@notice Updates the fee amount
 @param _newFeeInCents New fee in cents

@notice Removes a token from whitelist
 @param token Token to remove
